proof_script:
lemma fresh_subst_fmla_if [simp]: "j \<sharp> (A(i::=x)) \<longleftrightarrow> (atom i \<sharp> A \<and> j \<sharp> A) \<or> (j \<sharp> x \<and> (j \<sharp> A \<or> j = atom i))"
by (nominal_induct A avoiding: i x rule: fmla.strong_induct) (auto simp: fresh_at_base)

by (nominal_induct A avoiding: i x rule: fmla.strong_induct) (auto simp: fresh_at_base)
